alert.note: Alert for Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 7:02PM CDT until April 26 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SABINE PARISH... At 702 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Converse, or 21 miles south of Mansfield, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Zwolle, Converse, Oak Grove, Noble, Belmont and Toledo Bend Reservoir North. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
